main event: An elliptical shaped object the size of a football with pulsating lights was observed over the horizon for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound,The sighting was made in the known missile range area,The object disappeared quickly on the horizon,Initial sighting was 15 degrees above the horizon,Duration of observation was noted as 2-3 minutes
sighted object: elliptical shaped object with pulsating lights
